channel.title: I have this problem can someone help me?
channel.description:
hey like the title says i have this problem when i try to Run my source.
Exception in thread "main" [2/27/13 12:16 AM]: java.io.IOExc stablish loopback connection at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl$Initializer.run(PipeImpl.java:125 at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl$Initializer.run(PipeImpl.java:69) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Me at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl.(PipeImpl.java:141) at sun.nio.ch.SelectorProviderImpl.openPipe(SelectorProv at java.nio.channels.Pipe.open(Pipe.java:150) at sun.nio.ch.WindowsSelectorImpl.(WindowsSelector at sun.nio.ch.WindowsSelectorProvider.openSelector(Windo java:44) at java.nio.channels.Selector.open(Selector.java:227) at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.s Acceptor.java:162) at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.b java:141) at server.Server.main(Server.java:160) Caused by: java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: co at sun.nio.ch.Net.connect0(Native Method) at sun.nio.ch.Net.connect(Net.java:364) at sun.nio.ch.Net.connect(Net.java:356) at sun.nio.ch.SocketChannelImpl.connect(SocketChannelImp at java.nio.channels.SocketChannel.open(SocketChannel.ja at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl$Initializer.run(PipeImpl.java:97) ... 11 more
Can someone please help?
